0: AN ACT REMOVING THE RESTRICTIONS UNDER SECTIONS 118, 119, 121, 122 AND 123 OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NO. 141, AS AMENDED, ON FREE PATENTS ISSUED UNDER SECTION 44 THEREOF
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11231 enacted on 2019-02-22 Substituted by HB08078
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03256
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REMOVING THE RESTRICTIONS UNDER SECTIONS 118, 119, 121, 122 AND 123 OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NO. 141, AS AMENDED, ON FREE PATENTS ISSUED UNDER SECTION 44 THEREOF
SHORT TITLE : " Agricultural Free Patent Reform Act "
ABSTRACT : Provides that subject to the Constitutional restrictions on foreign ownership of lands, agricultural public lands alienated or disposed in favor of qualified public land applicants under Sec. 44 of C.A. No.141, as amended, shall not be subject to restrictions re: encumbrances, conveyances, transfers or dispositions imposed under the above-mentioned Sections of C.A. No. 141, as amended. Provides likewise that retroactive effect and restrictions on free patents issued under Sec.44 thereof before the effectivity of this Act shall be removed and are hereby immediately lifted.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALCEDA, JOEY SARTE
DATE FILED : 2016-08-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HB08078
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2016-08-31
